languages.text: "В одном таком ящике — сведения о последней миссии в Каликсисе, в другом — последние декреты Лекс Империалис, в третьем — память о своем детстве. Рядовому человеку такая сортировка покажется чем-то безумным. Но это всего лишь цена, которую приходится платить, чтобы из обычного слуги Империума стать полезным инструментом Инквизиции".

"One box might contain information about a recent mission in the Calixis, another the latest decrees of the Lex Imperialis, and another her own childhood memories. This level of compartmentalisation might seem somewhat insane to the untrained eye, but it is the price one must pay to turn an ordinary servant into a useful tool of the Inquisition."
languages.original_text: "В одном таком ящике — сведения о последней миссии в Каликсисе, в другом — последние декреты Лекс Империалис, в третьем — память о своем детстве. Рядовому человеку такая сортировка покажется чем-то безумным. Но это всего лишь цена, которую приходится платить, чтобы из обычного слуги Империума стать полезным инструментом Инквизиции".

traits.locale_text: "One box might contain information about a recent mission in the Calixis, another the latest decrees of the Lex Imperialis, and another her own childhood memories. This level of compartmentalisation might seem somewhat insane to the untrained eye, but it is the price one must pay to turn an ordinary Imperial servant into a useful tool of the Inquisition."

"One box might contain information about a recent mission in the Calixis, another the latest decrees of the Lex Imperialis, and another her own childhood memories. This level of compartmentalisation might seem somewhat insane to the untrained eye, but it is the price one must pay to turn an ordinary Imperial servant into a useful tool of the Inquisition."

"One box might contain information about a recent mission in the Calixis, another the latest decrees of the Lex Imperialis, and another her own childhood memories. This level of compartmentalisation might seem somewhat insane to the untrained eye, but it is the price one must pay to turn an ordinary Imperial servant into a useful tool of the Inquisition."

"One box might contain information about a recent mission in the Calixis, another the latest decrees of the Lex Imperialis, and another her own childhood memories. This level of compartmentalisation might seem somewhat insane to the untrained eye, but it is the price one must pay to turn an ordinary servant into a useful tool of the Inquisition."

languages.text: “某个盒子里可能会装着关于卡利西斯最新任务的信息，另一个盒子里装着帝国法务部的最新发令，而其他盒子里可能会装着她自己的童年记忆。在未经训练的人看来，这种将记忆分门别类整理的方式或许有些疯狂，但普通人若是想为审判庭效力，就必须付出这样的代价。”
languages.original_text: "One box might contain information about a recent mission in the Calixis, another the latest decrees of the Lex Imperialis, and another her own childhood memories. This level of compartmentalisation might seem somewhat insane to the untrained eye, but it is the price one must pay to turn an ordinary servant into a useful tool of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: “某个盒子里可能会装着关于卡利西斯最新任务的信息，另一个盒子里装着帝国法务部的最新发令，而其他盒子里可能会装着她自己的童年记忆。在未经训练的人看来，这种将记忆分门别类整理的方式或许有些疯狂，但普通人若是想为审判庭效力，就必须付出这样的代价。”

languages.text: «Una caja puede contener información sobre una misión reciente en Calixis, otra, los decretos más recientes de la Lex Imperialis, y otra más sus recuerdos de niña. Para los inexpertos, ese nivel de compartimentación parecerá una locura, pero es el precio a pagar por convertir a un ciudadano en una herramienta útil para la Inquisición».
languages.original_text: "One box might contain information about a recent mission in the Calixis, another the latest decrees of the Lex Imperialis, and another her own childhood memories. This level of compartmentalisation might seem somewhat insane to the untrained eye, but it is the price one must pay to turn an ordinary servant into a useful tool of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: «Una caja puede contener información sobre una misión reciente en Calixis, otra, los decretos más recientes de la Lex Imperialis, y otra más sus recuerdos de niña. Para los inexpertos, ese nivel de compartimentación parecerá una locura, pero es el precio a pagar por convertir a un ciudadano del Imperium en una herramienta útil para la Inquisición».

languages.text: 「1つの箱には、カリクシスでの最近の任務に関する情報が含まれている可能性があり、もう1つはレックス・インペリア号の最新の法令、そしてもう1つは彼女自身の子供時代の思い出が含まれている可能性があります。このレベルの区分は、訓練されていない目には、いくぶん狂っているように見えるかもしれませんが、それはありふれた従者を異端審問庁の便利な道具に変えるために支払わなければならない代償です」
languages.original_text: "One box might contain information about a recent mission in the Calixis, another the latest decrees of the Lex Imperialis, and another her own childhood memories. This level of compartmentalisation might seem somewhat insane to the untrained eye, but it is the price one must pay to turn an ordinary servant into a useful tool of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: 「1つの箱には、カリクシスでの最近の任務に関する情報が含まれている可能性があり、もう1つはレックス・インペリア号の最新の法令、そしてもう1つは彼女自身の子供時代の思い出が含まれている可能性があります。このレベルの区分は、訓練されていない目には、いくぶん狂っているように見えるかもしれませんが、それはありふれた従者を異端審問庁の便利な道具に変えるために支払わなければならない代償です」

languages.text: « Par exemple, l'une de ces boîtes pourrait contenir des informations sur une récente mission dans le secteur Calixis ; une autre, les derniers décrets de la Lex Imperialis ; et encore une autre, ses propres souvenirs d'enfance. Ce niveau de compartimentation peut paraître fou aux yeux des profanes, mais il s'agit du prix à payer pour faire d'une servante ordinaire un puissant outil de l'Inquisition. »
languages.original_text: "One box might contain information about a recent mission in the Calixis, another the latest decrees of the Lex Imperialis, and another her own childhood memories. This level of compartmentalisation might seem somewhat insane to the untrained eye, but it is the price one must pay to turn an ordinary servant into a useful tool of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: « Par exemple, l'une de ces boîtes pourrait contenir des informations sur une récente mission dans le secteur Calixis ; une autre, les derniers décrets de la Lex Imperialis ; et encore une autre, ses propres souvenirs d'enfance. Ce niveau de compartimentation peut paraître fou aux yeux des profanes, mais il s'agit du prix à payer pour faire d'une servante impériale ordinaire un puissant outil de l'Inquisition. »

languages.text: "Ein Kasten enthält vielleicht Informationen über eine kürzlich erfolgte Mission nach Calixis, ein anderer den neuesten Erlass im Lex Imperia und ein weiterer ihre eigenen Kindheitserinnerungen. Dieses Ausmaß der Aufteilung mag für das ungeübte Auge anmuten wie Wahnsinn, ist aber der Preis, um eine gewöhnliche Dienerin in ein nützliches Werkzeug der Inquisition zu verwandeln."
languages.original_text: "One box might contain information about a recent mission in the Calixis, another the latest decrees of the Lex Imperialis, and another her own childhood memories. This level of compartmentalisation might seem somewhat insane to the untrained eye, but it is the price one must pay to turn an ordinary servant into a useful tool of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Kasten enthält vielleicht Informationen über eine kürzlich erfolgte Mission nach Calixis, ein anderer den neuesten Erlass im Lex Imperia und ein weiterer ihre eigenen Kindheitserinnerungen. Dieses Ausmaß der Aufteilung mag für das ungeübte Auge anmuten wie Wahnsinn, ist aber der Preis, um eine gewöhnliche Dienerin des Imperiums in ein nützliches Werkzeug der Inquisition zu verwandeln."

languages.text: "Kutunun birinde Calixis'te kısa süre önceki bir göreve dair bilgiler yer alırken bir diğerinde Lex İmperialis'in son hükümleri, bir başkasındaysa kendi çocukluk anıları olabiliyor. Bu seviye bir bölmeleme yeteneği, eğitimsiz gözlere delice gelebilir. Oysa bu, sıradan bir hizmetkârı Engizisyon'un kullanışlı bir gerecine çevirmek için ödenmesi gereken bir bedeldir."
languages.original_text: "One box might contain information about a recent mission in the Calixis, another the latest decrees of the Lex Imperialis, and another her own childhood memories. This level of compartmentalisation might seem somewhat insane to the untrained eye, but it is the price one must pay to turn an ordinary servant into a useful tool of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: "Kutunun biri Calixis'te yakın zamanda gerçekleştirilen bir göreve dair bilgiler içerebilirken, bir diğeri Lex İmperialis'in son hükümlerini, bir diğeri ise kendi çocukluk anılarını içerebilmekte. Bu seviye bir bölmeleme yeteneği, eğitimsiz göze sanki delice görülebilir ama sıradan bir hizmetkârı, Engizisyon için kullanışlı bir gerece çevirmek için ödenmesi gereken bir bedeldir."
